transArray.content: The original Sanyuanqiao Ibis has the biggest advantage of convenient transportation. The front desk is neither cold nor enthusiastic. The convenience store downstairs is gone. The nearest one is 6.7 hundred meters away. The hardware facilities are upgraded to an intelligent level, and the sound insulation is too poor. , the upstairs is noisy at night, the corridor is noisy at 6:00 in the morning, there are not many types of breakfast, and the price/performance ratio is average
